3 namespace Ubiquity\translation\loader;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UFileSystem;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
7 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
8 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
9 
19 class ArrayLoader implements LoaderInterface {
20  private $rootDir;
21  private $key="translations/";
22 
23  private function getRootKey($locale = null, $domain = null) {
24  return $this->key . $locale ?? '' . $domain ?? '';
25  }
26 
27  public function __construct($rootDir) {
28  $this->rootDir = $rootDir;
29  }
30 
31  public function load($locale, $domain = '*') {
32  $key = $this->getRootKey ( $locale, $domain );
33  if(CacheManager::$cache->exists($key)){
34  return CacheManager::$cache->fetch($key);
35  }
36  $messages = [ ];
37  $rootDirectory = $this->getRootDirectory ( $locale );
38  if (file_exists ( $rootDirectory )) {
39  $files = UFileSystem::glob_recursive ( $rootDirectory . $domain . '.php' );
40  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
41  if (file_exists ( $file )) {
42  $name = basename ( $file, '.php' );
43  Logger::info ( 'Translate', 'Loading ' . $locale . '.' . $domain . ' from file ' . $name, 'load', [ get_class () ] );
44  $messages [$name] = $this->loadFile ( $file );
45  }
46  }
47  $this->flatten ( $messages );
48  CacheManager::$cache->store($key, "return ".UArray::asPhpArray($messages,'array').';');
49  } else {
50  return false;
51  }
52 
53  return $messages;
54  }
55 
56  public function clearCache($locale = null, $domain = null) {
57  CacheManager::$cache->clearCache($this->getRootKey($locale,$domain));
58  }
59 
60  protected function loadFile($filename) {
61  return include $filename;
62  }
63 
64  private function getRootDirectory($locale) {
65  return $this->rootDir . \DS . $locale . \DS;
66  }
67 
68  private function getDirectory($domain, &$filename) {
69  $parts = explode ( '.', $domain );
70  $filename = array_pop ( $parts ) . ".php";
71  return implode ( \DS, $parts );
72  }
73 
91  private function flatten(array &$messages, array $subnode = null, $path = null) {
92  if (null === $subnode) {
93  $subnode = &$messages;
94  }
95  foreach ( $subnode as $key => $value ) {
96  if (\is_array ( $value )) {
97  $nodePath = $path ? $path . '.' . $key : $key;
98  $this->flatten ( $messages, $value, $nodePath );
99  if (null === $path) {
100  unset ( $messages [$key] );
101  }
102  } elseif (null !== $path) {
103  $messages [$path . '.' . $key] = $value;
104  }
105  }
106  }
107 
108  public function save($messages, $locale, $domain) {
109  $content = "<?php\nreturn " . UArray::asPhpArray ( $messages, 'array' ) . ';';
110  $filename = "";
111  $path = $this->getRootDirectory ( $locale ) . $this->getDirectory ( $domain, $filename );
112  if (UFileSystem::safeMkdir ( $path )) {
113  if (@\file_put_contents ( $path . \DS . $filename, $content, LOCK_EX ) === false) {
114  throw new \Exception ( "Unable to write cache file: {$filename}" );
115  }
116  } else {
117  throw new \Exception ( "Unable to create folder : {$path}" );
118  }
119  }
120 }
